greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = gcd(A034448(n)-n, n-A048146(n)), where A034448 and A048146 are respectively the sum of unitary and non-unitary divisors of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: A034448(n) = { my(f=factorint(n)); prod(k=1, #f~, 1+(f[k, 1]^f[k, 2])); }; \\ After code in A034448
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 23 2019
